PatchChangeDTO Data Type

Contains information about a patch change to an object

Properties
name data type description
field ObjectHandle The field being modified
old_value PatchValueDTO The value of the field as you know it. This is necessary to determine if it is safe to modify the field.
new_value PatchValueDTO The value you want to set for the field.

Example

{
  "field" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "old_value" : {
    "object" : { }
  },
  "new_value" : {
    "object" : { }
  }
}
